entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 March 2023
